name: Sernek & Teeth
description:
Sernek & Teeth is based on the first trailer for Sonic The Hedgehog movie and is my submission for the The Hedgehog: The Movie: The Game Jam. 

Race at super-sonic speeds along the road through three different stages. Experience the trailer's story, or maybe your Sernek will say something different?

The current version of the game is a safety upload for the jam and will be updated shortly.
